name: Chicken A
description:
Chicken A is the only 2D retro-inspired platformer game where you can be both a chicken overlord and a cute chicken pet. Play through 4 action-packed levels, each giving you the choice to augment your chicken genetically. Based on your choices, your chicken can turn out to be anything you want!

(As long as that anything fits within 4 pre-determined ending options, that is.)

  2D retro action!

Run, jump, and of course - don't fall down any pits!

  A game of choice

Will you choose to modify Chicken A and deal with the consequences of your actions, whether they be good or bad? Will you instead keep away from meddling with nature and take on the risks that come with that? Play to find out and reach one of 4 endings based on your choices!

 Keep in control

Play with either the keyboard or a gamepad. The choice is yours and yours alone!

Movement

Jumping / Confirming

Exit game 

Enter / Exit full screen

  Credits
  • Sprites, Animation, Tiles, Music, Game design and programming: Filip Ivanov (Pirate Shell)
  • Level design and background art: Ruben te Wierik
  • Game design, Ideation: Ümmüsümeyye Artar, Minka Geelen
  • Playtesting: Bram M. Rouwhorst, Clara Drăgănuță  
  • Additional timeline art: Leonardo Chávez Sáenz
  • The muse(s):  Minka Geelen, Clara Drăgănuță
